body_html: currently I want to generate one Dense Tensor by Sparse Tensor, it is very usual that generating one dense tensor with big dim(such as 100k dim) by some word indexs. but it seems sparse_to_dense op only works for CPU. so the problem is that if I have 8 GPUs, I have to run sparse_to_dense 8 times in the CPU serially and send them to 8 GPUs, the Parallel running performance is very bad!

body: currently I want to generate one Dense Tensor by Sparse Tensor, it is very usual that generating one dense tensor with big dim(such as 100k dim) by some word indexs. but it seems sparse_to_dense op only works for CPU. so the problem is that if I have 8 GPUs,  I have to run sparse_to_dense 8 times in the CPU serially and send them to 8 GPUs, the  Parallel running performance is very bad!
